hero.title: Building Digital
hero.subtitle: Passionate full-stack developer crafting innovative solutions with modern technologies. I turn ideas into reality through clean code and creative problem-solving.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate developer with a love for creating amazing digital experiences
about.heading: Hi, I'm a Full-Stack Developer
about.description1: With over 5 years of experience in software development, I specialize in building scalable web applications and mobile solutions. My journey began with curiosity about how things work, and it has evolved into a passion for creating digital experiences that make a difference.
about.description2: I believe in clean code, user-centered design, and continuous learning. When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.
about.description3: My goal is to help businesses and individuals bring their ideas to life through innovative technology solutions.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Some of my recent work that I'm proud of

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Features include user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard.

taskManagement.title: Task Management App
taskManagement.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

weatherDashboard.title: Weather Dashboard
weatherDashboard.description: A responsive weather dashboard that provides current weather conditions, forecasts, and location-based weather alerts.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's work together to bring your ideas to life
contact.conversationDescription: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Whether you have a question, want to collaborate, or just want to say hi, I'd love to hear from you!

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey and career milestones

seniorDeveloper.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
seniorDeveloper.description: Leading development of enterprise-scale applications and mentoring junior developers. Responsible for architectural decisions and technical strategy.
achievements: Led a team of 5 developers in building a microservices architecture
Improved application performance by 40% through optimization
Mentored 3 junior developers and conducted code reviews

fullStackDeveloper.title: Full-Stack Developer
fullStackDeveloper.description: Developed full-stack web applications using modern technologies. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products.
achievements: Built 3 major features that increased user engagement by 25%
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 60%
Collaborated with design team to improve user experience

frontendDeveloper.title: Frontend Developer
frontendDeveloper.description: Focused on creating responsive and interactive user interfaces. Worked closely with designers to implement pixel-perfect designs.
achievements: Developed 15+ responsive websites for various clients
Reduced page load time by 30% through optimization
Implemented accessibility features improving WCAG compliance

testimonials.title: What Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Testimonials from satisfied clients and colleagues

client1.name: Sarah Johnson
client1.content: Working with this developer was an absolute pleasure. The code quality was exceptional and the communication throughout the project was outstanding. Highly recommended!

client2.name: Michael Chen
client2.content: The technical expertise and problem-solving skills are top-notch. Delivered our project ahead of schedule with zero bugs. Will definitely work together again.

client3.name: Emily Rodriguez
client3.content: Amazing attention to detail and ability to translate complex designs into beautiful, functional code. The collaboration was seamless and the results exceeded expectations.
